alert.note: Alert for Allendale; Hampton (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 09 at 2:32PM EST until January 09 at 2:45PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM EST FOR PORTIONS OF SCREVEN...BULLOCH...EFFINGHAM...HAMPTON AND ALLENDALE COUNTIES... At 232 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Ulmer to Oliver, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include: Allendale, Lake Warren State Park, Estill, Fairfax, Brunson, Gifford, Newington, Oliver, Scotia, Sycamore, Luray, Ulmer, Seigling, Egypt, and Shawnee. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A tornado watch remains in effect for the warned area. Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. Although a tornado is not immediately likely, if one is spotted act quickly and move to a place of safety inside a sturdy structure, such as a basement or small interior room.
